Putin asks voters, including in annexed Ukrainian areas, to determine Russia's futurePresident Vladimir Putin appealed on Thursday to voters, including in annexed parts of Ukraine, to be united in determining Russia's future by casting ballots in this week's presidential election which he is all but certain to win. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 00:57:45 GMT QQDTAXZ56BIIXD2LCPHWBIEWHE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-asks-voters-include-annexed-ukrainian-areas-definee-Russias-future-2024-03-14/Reuters世界欧洲
UK unveils new extremism definition amid rise in hate crimes against Jews, MuslimsBritain unveiled a new definition of extremism on Thursday in response to an eruption of hate crimes against Jews and Muslims since the Oct. 7 Hamas attacks on Israel, although critics said the change risked infringing on freedom of speech. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 00:04:02 GMT AIKJ6JLD5VPFTGYELO7YONZBUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-unveils-new-extremism-definition-amid-rise-hate-crimes-against-jews-muslims-2024-03-14/Michael Holden世界英国
US-South Korea defense talks on track, but November not a hard deadline-US officialU.S.-South Korean talks on sharing the cost of keeping American troops in South Korea are on track and ahead of schedule, but the U.S. side does not necessarily see a hard deadline ahead of the November U.S. election, a senior Biden administration official told Reuters. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:51:56 GMT ACEABBJS7ZLNNLYPMTLBXUFUZA https://www.reuters.com/world/us-south-korea-defense-talks-track-november-not-hard-deadline-us-official-2024-03-13/David Brunnstrom, Trevor Hunnicutt世界
Moldova says Russia illegally printed ballots for election in separatist regionA senior official in ex-Soviet Moldova said on Wednesday Moscow was breaking laws by printing ballot papers in the separatist region of Transdniestria ahead of this week's Russian presidential election. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:27:48 GMT 27KHPO4QUNMSDEK4SVXN4IYSTI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-says- Russia-illegally-printed-ballots-election-separatist-region-2024-03-13/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Chinese foreign minister to visit Australia next week, Guardian reportsChinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi will visit Australia next week, the Guardian reported on Thursday, amid a thaw in ties between Beijing and Canberra after years of tensions. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:18:54 GMT ITBNVTPNNVMFFIOQI7TRH66KKY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-foreign-minister-visit-australia-next-week-guardian-reports-2024-03-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
US agency asks DoD to improve data accuracy of military equipment sent to UkraineThe U.S. Government Accountability Office (GAO) made recommendations on Wednesday to the Department of Defense to help ensure U.S.-origin equipment was being tracked and used appropriately in Ukraine. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:06:06 GMT UZDSAKVD7FJ4XHT5ZELH55T3LM https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/us-agency-asks-dod-improve-data-accuracy-military-equipment-sent-ukraine-2024-03-13/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Philippines' Marcos to meet Blinken next week as South China Sea tensions risePhilippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. will meet U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken on March 19 to tackle cooperation and security matters, the office of the Manila leader said in a statement late on Wednesday night. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 22:50:52 GMT U2VGC7UHJBKTRL6FETGIWE2SYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-marcos-meet-blinken-next-week-presidential-office-says-2024-03-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
Neophyte, patriarch of Bulgaria's Orthodox Church, dies at 78Patriarch Neophyte, a soft-spoken theologian who sought to restore the reputation of the Bulgarian Orthodox church hurt by links to businessmen and communist secret police, died at the age of 78, the church said late on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 22:29:46 GMT KO7NXLB6TBKOTNNJWTB65LLDWE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/neophyte-patriarch-bulgarias-orthodox-church-dies-78-2024-03-13/Reuters世界欧洲
US asks Panama to strip flags from Iranian ships sanctioned by WashingtonThe United States has asked Panama to ban Iranian vessels sanctioned by Washington from using its flag, U.S. State Department special envoy Abram Paley said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 22:26:36 GMT AZFG7YUBGNOIXIGLUPBWESNJY https://www.reuters.com/world/us-asks-panama-strip-flags-iranian-ships-sanctioned-by-washington-2024-03-13/Reuters世界
Rockfall at Australia gold mine kills one worker, injures anotherA 37-year-old man has died and another was seriously injured after rocks collapsed inside an underground gold mine in Australia's Victoria state, while 28 other workers at the site were rescued, authorities said on Thursday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 22:21:10 GMT MJ5HYTBAXVNXVOSOJCXRQLTQ7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/rockfall-australia-gold-mine-kills-one-worker-injures-another-2024-03-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
